data.title: Overall experience
data.text: Parking area was clean and well light. Room was clean. Just make sure you take your own iron. Staff was polite. I left a blouse and realized this when I got home. I called they and they had found it and held it for me till later that evening.

data.title: Look before you leap
data.text:
We found this location by mistake, our reservation to the motel next door was "lost" so at the very last minute we had to find a room over the 4th of July weekend. 

Check-in was good and the price was good(176.00 with taxes etc.for two nights/88.00) which was for room 211 a two room suite with one bath. 

Since we checked in  in a hurry as we left almost immediately to see some firework displays we didn't really check the room out closely. When returned 6 hours later all we wanted to do was get some rest for the next days adventure(Universal Studios) so to bed we went.

The following morning we got ready to spend t day at Universal and off went. When we returned that night we were welcomed to this location by four West Covina Police cars/officers who were serving some sort of warrant on a individual near our room. After getting to our room without any problems we found it not cleaned, the beds not made, no fresh towels, trash cans not cleaned,  etc. We immediately went to the front desk and were given clean towels and another roll of toilet paper since the roll we had was almost gone. 

As we finally looking the room over for the 1st time my wife and granddaughter found numerous burgers(dried up snot) on numerous walls and throughout the bathroom. did this change our mind about this place? no but needless to say we'll check more closely next time but for the cost and considering the circumstances of finding this room believe it or not it really wasn't too bad.

data.title: "Drug Dealing Nightmare"
data.text: The motel rooms were used to “facilitate” the crime of drug dealing. My family and I stayed one night on this motel, we observed drug transactions in the second-floor. Two hours after the check in, the police showed up and raided one room, They were attempting to arrest the suspects but they fled on foot. We saw everything from the second floor, It was a nightmare!!! We don't recommend this motel...

data.title: forget this place
data.text: This motel amenities are listed as including refrigerator, microwave and coffeemakers in the rooms along with free wireless internet. I reserved in advance an upstairs smoking room. When I arrived I was told they now only had a downstairs room at the very back of the motel (due to "plumbing" problems).  From what I observed the place was nearly empty. There were no microwaves or coffeemakers  anywhere and the only way I can describe the fridge is a mini cooler which is barely cool and fit 2 bottles of water and a container of creamer. The internet signal was too weak to even access which prevented me from doing any work (the next morning I was able to access a signal from a motel down the street for goodness sake!). And they charge for ice! Seriously?!  The carpets and showers are dirty and the rooms really smelly and worn out. Guess they haven't heard of Febreeze? They had gardners using power weed trimmers and blowers at 7:30 AM on a Saturday morning directly in front of the rooms waking everyone. The only positive thing I can say is that the bed was fairly cmfortable and the young lady at the desk when I checked in was very nice. And the police were there for hours raiding a room on Friday night. Clearly these people do not care about their guests or repeat business. Really a bad experience. I was to stay 3 nights but I moved to another motel for the remainder of my trip.

data.title: 普通のモーテルです。
data.text:
部屋はきれいで悪くなかったのですが、予約サイトに書いてあった冷蔵庫がありませんでした。それとWi-fiの接続が非常に悪く、ほとんど使えませんでした（ビジネスをしている人にとっては致命的です。）
値段はLos Angeles近郊の値段にしては非常に手頃なのですが、同じ位の値段ならもっといいホテルがあるっていうのが本音です。次は泊まろうとは思いませんでした。
